properties.body:
BRAZIL-SOUTHEAST COAST.
1. SEISMIC SURVEY IN PROGRESS UNTIL 060159Z JAN 12 BY
   M/V WESTERN MONARCH TOWING THREE MILE LONG CABLES
   AND M/V GECO DIAMOND TOWING 250 METER LONG CABLE
   IN AREA BETWEEN
   21-54S 22-21S AND 040-12W 039-30W.
   SIX MILE BERTH REQUESTED.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 060259Z JAN 12.
